name: Pluto (Popcorniosaurus)
description:
My game is currently not working as it should. It does work in the unityengine but somehow it doesn't in the WebGl, if you have a fix plz contact me. Almost the entirety of my game is missing but I decided to upload it anyway in the hope I would find a fix later.

This game is about Pluto fighting the entire Solar system. Fight your way through all the planets. Use you moon as a slingshot to kill all the opponents. 

Controls:

WASD to move

hold left mouse button to make your moon start spinning

click right mouse button to make your moon build momentum

A moon with more velocity will deal more damage.
